topic.title: Lake-Town
topic.shortdesc: The company in finally in sight of the Lonely Mountain; they have reached Lake-Town.

section.title: Lake-Town
section.p: The dwarves float in their barrels down the river, until the current carries them to Lake-Town, a floating village built by the humans from Dale. The citizens of Lake-Town learn of the company's purpose and outfit them with everything they need to enter the mountain.

image.alt: Lake-Town with the Lonely Mountain in the background
